p: The S2 domain contains fusion peptide (FP) and heptad repeat (HR) 1 and 2 [ 3] (Fig. 3). Following binding of RBD to ACE2, the S2 domain undergoes conformational changes to facilitate membrane fusion and these events facilitate virus entry into target cells [ 3]. The importance of S protein, especially the RBD region, makes it a potential target for SARS-CoV-2 vaccine and antibody-based drug development [ 19].
